s.text: The best detail I've encountered is from the Los Angeles Times , which traced a crucial piece of Furrow's AR-15 assault rifle to Bushmaster Firearms in Maine.
Which ones are willing to say that taking an anti-crime stance means finding a way to either stamp out these groups or isolate them so completely that they can't try to kill more innocent people?
Here is Buford Furrow, a suspect very easy to grasp: a longtime affiliate of the Aryan Nations who is obsessed with guns and mass murder and who eventually tips over from theory into practice.
